The Grand Tournament.name: Healing Totem
The Grand Tournament.text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to all friendly minions.

The Grand Tournament.name: Might of the Hostler
The Grand Tournament.text: Warhorse Trainer is granting this minion +1 Attack.

The Grand Tournament.name: Power Word: Glory
The Grand Tournament.text: When this attacks, restore 4 Health to the hero of the player who buffed it.

The Grand Tournament.name: Villainy
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Hero Power costs (5) more this turn.

The Grand Tournament.name: Ambush!
The Grand Tournament.text: When you draw this, summon a 4/4 Nerubian for your opponent. Draw a card.

The Grand Tournament.name: Arcane Blast
The Grand Tournament.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

The Grand Tournament.name: Brave Archer
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This is a "bearly" concealed reference.

The Grand Tournament.name: Buccaneer
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

The Grand Tournament.name: Competitive Spirit
The Grand Tournament.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

The Grand Tournament.name: Flash Heal
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

The Grand Tournament.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

The Grand Tournament.name: Injured Kvaldir
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

The Grand Tournament.name: Living Roots
The Grand Tournament.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

The Grand Tournament.name: Lowly Squire
The Grand Tournament.flavor: But not the lowliest!

The Grand Tournament.name: Power Word: Glory
The Grand Tournament.text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

The Grand Tournament.name: Tournament Attendee
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

The Grand Tournament.name: Alexstrasza's Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

The Grand Tournament.name: Ancestral Knowledge
The Grand Tournament.flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

The Grand Tournament.name: Argent Lance
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

The Grand Tournament.name: Argent Watchman
The Grand Tournament.text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

The Grand Tournament.name: Ballista Shot
The Grand Tournament.text: Hero Power Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.

The Grand Tournament.name: Bear Trap
The Grand Tournament.text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

The Grand Tournament.name: Bolster
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

The Grand Tournament.name: Boneguard Lieutenant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

The Grand Tournament.name: Confuse
The Grand Tournament.text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This minion is really powerful!

The Grand Tournament.name: Convert
The Grand Tournament.text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

The Grand Tournament.name: Cutpurse
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

The Grand Tournament.name: Darnassus Aspirant
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

The Grand Tournament.name: Demonfuse
The Grand Tournament.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dire Shapeshift
The Grand Tournament.text: Hero Power Gain 2 Armor and +2 Attack this turn.

The Grand Tournament.name: Druid of the Saber
The Grand Tournament.text: Choose One - Transform to gain Charge; or +1/+1 and Stealth.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

The Grand Tournament.name: Fallen Hero
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: And he can't get up.

The Grand Tournament.name: Flame Juggler
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

The Grand Tournament.name: Garrison Commander
The Grand Tournament.text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

The Grand Tournament.name: King's Elekk
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

The Grand Tournament.name: Lance Carrier
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

The Grand Tournament.name: Lock and Load
The Grand Tournament.text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."

This card pays homage to that special moment.

The Grand Tournament.name: Sparring Partner
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Come at me, bro.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

The Grand Tournament.name: Totem Golem
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

The Grand Tournament.name: Totemic Slam
The Grand Tournament.text: Hero Power Summon a Totem of your choice.

The Grand Tournament.name: Undercity Valiant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

The Grand Tournament.name: Wrathguard
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

The Grand Tournament.name: Wyrmrest Agent
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

The Grand Tournament.name: Argent Horserider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: His horse's name is Betsy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Bash
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

The Grand Tournament.name: Beneath the Grounds
The Grand Tournament.text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

The Grand Tournament.name: Burgle
The Grand Tournament.text: Add 2 random class cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Yoink!

The Grand Tournament.name: Coliseum Manager
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dragonhawk Rider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dreadscale
The Grand Tournament.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

The Grand Tournament.name: Effigy
The Grand Tournament.text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Burning man, brah.

The Grand Tournament.name: Elemental Destruction
The Grand Tournament.flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

The Grand Tournament.name: Eydis Darkbane
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: HATES being called "the wonder twins".

The Grand Tournament.name: Fencing Coach
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

The Grand Tournament.name: Fjola Lightbane
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

The Grand Tournament.name: Healing Wave
The Grand Tournament.text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

The Grand Tournament.name: Ice Rager
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

The Grand Tournament.name: King's Defender
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

The Grand Tournament.name: Light's Champion
The Grand Tournament.flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

The Grand Tournament.name: Master of Ceremonies
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

The Grand Tournament.name: Mulch
The Grand Tournament.text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

The Grand Tournament.name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

The Grand Tournament.name: Polymorph: Boar
The Grand Tournament.text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's always Huffer.

The Grand Tournament.name: Powershot
The Grand Tournament.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: pow POW pow

The Grand Tournament.name: Saboteur
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

The Grand Tournament.name: Seal of Champions
The Grand Tournament.text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

The Grand Tournament.name: Shadowfiend
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

The Grand Tournament.name: Shady Dealer
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

The Grand Tournament.name: Silent Knight
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

The Grand Tournament.name: Silver Hand Regent
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

The Grand Tournament.name: Spellslinger
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

The Grand Tournament.name: Stablemaster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tuskarr Totemic
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

The Grand Tournament.name: Warhorse Trainer
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

The Grand Tournament.name: Armored Warhorse
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

The Grand Tournament.name: Astral Communion
The Grand Tournament.text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

The Grand Tournament.name: Charged Hammer
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Crowd Favorite
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dalaran Aspirant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

The Grand Tournament.name: Draenei Totemcarver
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dreadsteed
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

The Grand Tournament.name: Evil Heckler
The Grand Tournament.flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

The Grand Tournament.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
The Grand Tournament.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

The Grand Tournament.name: Frigid Snobold
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

The Grand Tournament.name: Gormok the Impaler
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

The Grand Tournament.name: Holy Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

The Grand Tournament.name: Magnataur Alpha
The Grand Tournament.text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

The Grand Tournament.name: Maiden of the Lake
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

The Grand Tournament.name: Murloc Knight
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

The Grand Tournament.name: Poisoned Blade
The Grand Tournament.text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

The Grand Tournament.name: Refreshment Vendor
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

The Grand Tournament.name: Savage Combatant
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

The Grand Tournament.name: Spawn of Shadows
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tournament Medic
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

The Grand Tournament.name: Twilight Guardian
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

The Grand Tournament.name: Wildwalker
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

The Grand Tournament.name: Clockwork Knight
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

The Grand Tournament.name: Flame Lance
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

The Grand Tournament.name: Kvaldir Raider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

The Grand Tournament.name: Mukla's Champion
The Grand Tournament.flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

The Grand Tournament.name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

The Grand Tournament.name: Pit Fighter
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

The Grand Tournament.name: Ram Wrangler
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

The Grand Tournament.name: Recruiter
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

The Grand Tournament.name: Shado-Pan Rider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

The Grand Tournament.name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

The Grand Tournament.name: Tuskarr Jouster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

The Grand Tournament.name: Ball of Spiders
The Grand Tournament.flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

The Grand Tournament.name: Bolf Ramshield
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

The Grand Tournament.name: Coldarra Drake
The Grand Tournament.text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

The Grand Tournament.name: Dark Bargain
The Grand Tournament.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

The Grand Tournament.name: Enter the Coliseum
The Grand Tournament.text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

The Grand Tournament.name: Grand Crusader
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

The Grand Tournament.name: Justicar Trueheart
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

The Grand Tournament.name: Kodorider
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

The Grand Tournament.name: Master Jouster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

The Grand Tournament.name: Mogor's Champion
The Grand Tournament.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

The Grand Tournament.name: Mysterious Challenger
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

The Grand Tournament.name: Sea Reaver
The Grand Tournament.text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

The Grand Tournament.name: Sideshow Spelleater
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Hey!  Let me try that...

The Grand Tournament.name: The Mistcaller
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

The Grand Tournament.name: The Skeleton Knight
The Grand Tournament.text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

The Grand Tournament.name: Void Crusher
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

The Grand Tournament.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
The Grand Tournament.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
The Grand Tournament.flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.

*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

The Grand Tournament.name: Acidmaw
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

The Grand Tournament.name: Captured Jormungar
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

The Grand Tournament.name: Chillmaw
The Grand Tournament.text: Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

The Grand Tournament.name: Confessor Paletress
The Grand Tournament.flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

The Grand Tournament.name: Eadric the Pure
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

The Grand Tournament.name: Fearsome Doomguard
The Grand Tournament.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

The Grand Tournament.name: Knight of the Wild
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

The Grand Tournament.name: Skycap'n Kragg
The Grand Tournament.text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

The Grand Tournament.name: Rhonin
The Grand Tournament.text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: A masterless shamurai.

The Grand Tournament.name: Anub'arak
The Grand Tournament.text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

The Grand Tournament.name: Aviana
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

The Grand Tournament.name: Icehowl
The Grand Tournament.flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

The Grand Tournament.name: North Sea Kraken
The Grand Tournament.flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

The Grand Tournament.name: Frost Giant
The Grand Tournament.text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

The Grand Tournament.name: Varian Wrynn
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dark Wispers
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +5/+5 and Taunt.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Extra Sharp
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +1 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gift of Mana

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Glaivezooka
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +1 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Grasp of Mal'Ganis
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Mal'Ganis is granting +2/+2.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ironed Out
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased stats.

Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased stats.

Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Metabolized Magic
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Metal Teeth
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +2 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Might of Zul'Farrak
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Multiplying Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Overclocked
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Spell Damage +2.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Pistons
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Pure
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Stats.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Repairs!
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +4 Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Retribution
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Attack

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Seal of Light
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +2 Attack this turn.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shadowed
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Health was swapped.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shrink Ray
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: -2 Attack this turn.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Switched
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Attack and Health have been swapped by Reversing Switch.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tank Mode
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +1 Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tank Mode
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +1 Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: The King
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Increased Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +3 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +3 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Velen's Chosen
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Whirling Blades
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: +1 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Burrowing Mine
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: When you draw this, it explodes. You take 10 damage and draw a card.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gallywix's Coin
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only. (Won't trigger Gallywix.)

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Target Dummy
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Armor Plating
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a minion +1 Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Boom Bot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1-4 damage to a random enemy.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Clockwork Gnome
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cogmaster
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Emergency Coolant
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Freeze a minion.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Finicky Cloakfield
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Light of the Naaru
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Reversing Switch
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Rusty Horn
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a minion Taunt.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shadowbomber
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Time Rewinder
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Warbot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Enrage: +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Whirling Blades
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a minion +1 Attack.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Anodized Robo Cub
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt. Choose One - +1 Attack; or +1 Health.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Call Pet
Goblins vs Gnomes.text:
Draw a card.
If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Real hunters tame hungry crabs.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Crackle
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $3-$6 damage. Overload: (1)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Snap! This card! Pop!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Darkbomb
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $3 damage.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Explosive Sheep
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Feign Death
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Flamecannon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gilblin Stalker
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Stealth
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."

"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Glaivezooka
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Goblin Auto-Barber
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mechwarper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Your Mechs cost (1) less.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Micro Machine
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This card is the real thing.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mistress of Pain
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever this minion deals damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: One-eyed Cheat
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Puddlestomper
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Recombobulator
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Seal of Light
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Restore #4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shadowboxer
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever a character is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shielded Minibot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Divine Shield
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ship's Cannon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shrinkmeister
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Snowchugger
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Steamwheedle Sniper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Stonesplinter Trogg
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Unstable Portal
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals.  We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Vitality Totem
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Windfury
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Bouncing Blade
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Coghammer
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cogmaster's Wrench
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Flying Machine
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Windfury
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gnomeregan Infantry
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Charge Taunt
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gnomish Experimenter
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Goblin Sapper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Grove Tender
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Hobgoblin
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits.  First on the list: dental plan.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Illuminator
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Iron Sensei
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.

0110100001101001

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lil' Exorcist
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Metaltooth Leaper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Muster for Battle
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ogre Brute
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ogre Warmaul
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Powermace
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Scarlet Purifier
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions with Deathrattle.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Scarlet Crusade is doing market research to find out if the "Mauve Crusade" would be better received.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Soot Spewer
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Spell Damage +1
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Spider Tank
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "What if we put guns on it?" -Fizzblitz, staring at the spider-transportation-machine

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinkertown Technician
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, gain +1/+1 and add a Spare Part to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Won't you take me to... Tinkertown?

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Velen's Chosen
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ancestor's Call
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dunemaul Shaman
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Windfury, Overload: (1) 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Echo of Medivh
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Enhance-o Mechano
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield. (at random)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: His enhancements are gluten free!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Fel Cannon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Goblin Blastmage
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Imp-losion
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Jeeves
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Kezan Mystic
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lost Tallstrider
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mechanical Yeti
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Give each player a Spare Part.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mini-Mage
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Stealth Spell Damage +1
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Piloted Shredder
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Sabotage
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Screwjank Clunker
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Wee Spellstopper
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Antique Healbot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Blingtron 3000
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Bolvar Fordragon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Bomb Lobber
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cobalt Guardian
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cobra Shot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Demonheart
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Druid of the Fang
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Fel Reaver
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: So reaver. Much fel. Wow.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Floating Watcher
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Hemet Nesingwary
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Junkbot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: King of Beasts
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Madder Bomber
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Dang, Bomber, calm down.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mimiron's Head
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Do not push the big red button!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Ogre Ninja
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Stealth 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Quartermaster
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Salty Dog
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Siege Engine
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Wintergrasp Keep's only weakness!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Upgraded Repair Bot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Vol'jin
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Anima Golem
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dark Wispers
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gazlowe
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever you cast a 1-mana spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Iron Juggernaut
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Lightbomb
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mech-Bear-Cat
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mogor the Ogre
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Piloted Sky Golem
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Recycle
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shieldmaiden
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Toshley
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Something about power converters.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Trade Prince Gallywix
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Crush
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Dr. Boom
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Flame Leviathan
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Gahz'rilla
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Malorne
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Neptulon
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Troggzor the Earthinator
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Foe Reaper 4000
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Also damages the minions next to whomever he attacks.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Force-Tank MAX
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Divine Shield
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Sneed's Old Shredder
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random legendary minion.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: V-07-TR-0N
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Charge Mega-Windfury (Can attack four times a turn.)

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mal'Ganis
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2. Your hero is Immune.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Tree of Life
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Restore all characters to full Health.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Healing: It grows on trees!

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Clockwork Giant
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.
